:::: {.callout-note collapse=true}
## 応募倍率の推移（図）

点・線がない箇所は定員到達による募集なしを意味します。

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, dplyr, stringr)

tibble(year = rep(2022:2026, each = 6)) |> 
   mutate(time = rep(rep(1:3, each = 2), n() / 6),
          kibo = rep(1:2, n() / 2)) |> 
   mutate(time = str_c("第", time, "次募集"),
          kibo = str_c("第", kibo, "希望")) |> 
   mutate(apply = c(0, 0, 6, 2, 4, NA,
                    3, 1, 6, 1, 1, NA,
                    2, 1, 10, NA, NA, NA,
                    2, 5, 8, NA, NA, NA,
                    7, 4, 11, NA, NA, NA),
          pass  = c(0, 0, 6, 2, 4, NA,
                    3, 1, 6, 1, 1, NA,
                    2, 1, 9, NA, NA, NA,
                    2, 5, 4, NA, NA, NA,
                    7, 2, 3, NA, NA, NA)) |> 
   mutate(comp = apply / pass,
          comp = if_else(is.nan(comp), 0, comp)) |> 
   ggplot(aes(x = year, y = comp)) +
   geom_hline(yintercept = 1, linetype = "dashed") +
   geom_line(linewidth = 1, color = "tomato") +
   geom_point(size = 3, shape = 21, color = "white", fill = "tomato") +
   scale_y_continuous(breaks = 0:10, labels = c("応募者なし：0", "全員合格：1", 2:10)) +
   facet_grid(time ~ kibo) +
   labs(x = "入ゼミ年度", y = "倍率") +
   theme_bw()

```
